groups.name: easyj.loophole-check
groups.description: EasyJ定义的漏洞检测配置组.

groups.name: easyj.web.param-crypto.filter
groups.description: EasyJ参数加密解密过滤器配置组.

groups.name: easyj.web.param-crypto.handler
groups.description: EasyJ参数加密解密处理器配置组.

groups.name: easyj.logging
groups.description: EasyJ对日志功能的增强相关配置.

groups.name: easyj.logging.logback
groups.description: EasyJ对logback功能的增强相关配置.

properties.name: easyj.global.project
properties.description: 项目代码.

properties.name: easyj.global.project-name
properties.description: 项目名称.

properties.name: easyj.global.application
properties.description: 应用代码.

properties.name: easyj.global.application-name
properties.description: 应用名称.

properties.name: easyj.global.env
properties.description: 环境代码.

properties.name: easyj.global.env-name
properties.description: 环境名称.

properties.name: easyj.global.env-type
properties.description: 环境类型：prod|test|dev，默认：prod.

properties.name: easyj.global.run-mode
properties.description: 运行模式：release|debug，默认：release.

properties.name: easyj.global.in-unit-test
properties.description: 是否单元测试中.

properties.name: easyj.global.configs
properties.description: 其他全局配置的Map.

properties.name: easyj.loophole-check.log4j2
properties.description: log4j2的漏洞检测程序开关.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.config
properties.description: [logback] 可引用配置：配置文件路径.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.console-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用控制台打印日志.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用文件记录日志.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.file-name-prefix
properties.description: [logback] 文件名前缀，格式：${前缀}.${SERVER_PORT}.${LOG_LEVEL}.log，例：dwz-server.3001.error.log

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.all-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用 '*.all.log' 日志文件的记录.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.trace-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用 '*.trace.log' 日志文件的记录.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.debug-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用 '*.debug.log' 日志文件的记录.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.info-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用 '*.info.log' 日志文件的记录.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.warn-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用 '*.warn.log' 日志文件的记录.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.error-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用 '*.error.log' 日志文件的记录.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.fatal-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用 '*.fatal.log' 日志文件的记录.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.async-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否使用异步的方式记录日志到文件.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.file-appender.async-appender.queue-size
properties.description: [logback] 异步记录日志到文件时，日志队列的大小.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.kafka-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用将日志推送到 Kafka 中的appender.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.kafka-appender.bootstrap-servers
properties.description: [logback] 日志推送到的Kafka的服务地址.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.kafka-appender.topic
properties.description: [logback] 日志推送到的Kafka的topic.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.logstash-appender.enabled
properties.description: [logback] 是否启用将日志推送到 LogStash 中的appender.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.logstash-appender.destination
properties.description: [logback] 日志推送到的 LogStash 的地址.

properties.name: easyj.logging.logback.logstash-appender.queue-size
properties.description: [logback] logstash-appender的异步队列大小.

properties.name: easyj.server.host
properties.description: 当前服务内网地址：多网卡时，需要手动配置.

properties.name: easyj.server.data-center-id
properties.description: 当前服务所属数据中心ID.

properties.name: easyj.server.worker-id
properties.description: 当前服务工作ID.

properties.name: easyj.sequence.type
properties.description: 序列服务类型.

properties.name: easyj.web.param-crypto.filter.enabled
properties.description: 参数加密解密过滤器启用开关.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.type
properties.description: 短链接服务实现类型.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.easyj-middleware.send-type
properties.description: EasyJ的DWZ中间件调用方式.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.easyj-middleware.server-application-name
properties.description: send-type配置为 'feign' 时，该配置值必须与easyj-dwz-server端的spring.application-name的值保持一致.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.s3.service-url
properties.description: S-3短链接服务地址.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.s3.client-id
properties.description: S-3短链接服务-客户端ID.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.s3.client-secret
properties.description: S-3短链接服务-客户端密钥.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.baidu.service-url
properties.description: 百度云DWZ服务地址.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.baidu.term-of-validity
properties.description: 默认的短网址有效期.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.baidu.response-language
properties.description: 返回错误语言.

properties.name: easyj.sdk.dwz.baidu.token
properties.description: 百度云DWZ接口Token.

properties.name: easyj.web.poi.excel.export.list-field-name
properties.description: 全局配置列表属性名.

properties.name: easyj.middleware.websocket.server.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用中间件WebSocket服务端的功能.

properties.name: easyj.middleware.dwz.server.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用中间件DWZ（短链接服务）的功能.

properties.name: easyj.middleware.dwz.server.task.overtime-handle-strategy
properties.description: 超时短链接记录处理策略。默认：删除策略。

properties.name: easyj.middleware.dwz.server.log-store.type
properties.description: 短链接存储服务的类型.

values.description: 基于数据库实现的序列服务.
基于数据库实现的短链接记录存取服务.
基于模拟实现的短链接记录存取服务.
基于EasyJ自己的DWZ中间件实现的短链接功能.
(默认)基于S-3的DWZ实现的短链接功能.
基于百度云DWZ实现的短链接功能.
(默认)使用 HttpClientUtils 调用DWZ服务.
使用 SpringCloudFeign 接口调用DWZ服务.
(默认)基于腾讯云实现的身份证识别功能.
